citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, a written environmental enhancement plan for birds had not been developed by the facility and
made available for review. This plan is necessary to promote the psychological well-being of birds. Exhibitors must
develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan that has been approved by the attending veterinarian. The plan
must be in accordance with the regulations and with currently accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate
professional journals or reference guides.
Correct by 10/19/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
At the time of inspection, a written environmental enhancement plan for birds had not been developed by the facility and 
made available for review. This plan is necessary to promote the psychological well-being of birds. Exhibitors must 
develop, document, and follow a species-appropriate plan that has been approved by the attending veterinarian. The plan 
must be in accordance with the regulations and with currently accepted professional standards as cited in appropriate 
professional journals or reference guides. 
 
Correct by 10/19/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
